name: renderB
description:
"Inhabit an IKEA catalog. Embrace The Burj, Lick the leather on a Z4. Bury your face in a Seamaster."

renderB - an interactive architecture and product visualization experience in Virtual Reality.

************
NOTE: The Burj Khalifa, IKEA, BMW Z4, Omega Seamaster and other products shown in renderB are properties and trademarks of their respective owners and is in no manner associated with renderB or Atman Software. This showcase/experience is not an endorsement of renderB by any brand or company mentioned within.

This showcase is a representation in good faith of the products and brands we like, love or are inspired by.
************

renderB is a FREE experience. There are NO in-app purchases or ads or other monetization methods involved.

renderB was a 3D engine under development at Atman, that has been abandoned for years now. Instead of throwing away all the assets that were developed, the project is now being provided as a free experience running in Unreal.

Enjoy!
